thread.title: TOWIE's Kate Wright flaunts her taut stomach in Essex
thread.title_full: TOWIE's Kate Wright flaunts her taut stomach in Essex | Daily Mail Online

author: Lisa Mcloughlin For Mailonline
title: TOWIE's Kate Wright flaunts her taut stomach in Essex

organizations.name: kate in wolf & wake wolf & wake

text:
It's been reported that she is cosying up to former footballer Rio Ferdinand.
And while rumours continue to swirl, Kate Wright put on a tummy teasing display as she stepped out for filming the new series of TOWIE alongside pal Georgia Kousoulou in Essex on Friday.
The 25-year-old reality looked sensational as she slipped into a demure cobalt blue two piece that hugged her curves as she arrived to set.
Scroll down for video
Divine: Kate Wright put on a tummy teasing display as she stepped out for filming the new series of TOWIE alongside pal Georgia Kousoulou in Essex on Friday
Kate - who split from ex Dan Edgar after six years together in 2016 - displayed her ample cleavage in her sheer crop with head-turning blue embellished lace detail.
Highlighting her narrow waist, her fishtail skirt exhibited her toned stomach as the full-length piece followed the shape of her hourglass curves.
Completing her look, she wrapped a matching lace blue choker around her neck for fashion effect as her long blonde locks fell down her shoulders in a glamorous curl.
While, her ITVBe co-star Georgia looked incredible in a coordinating embellished mini dress that flaunted her bronzed glow after returning back from Tenerife on Thursday.
In the blue: The 25-year-old reality looked sensational as she slipped into a demure cobalt blue two piece that hugged her curves as she arrived to set
Be bold in a blue maxi skirt like Kate in Wolf & Wake Wolf & Wake made to measure look
Check out their Instagram page here
Buy now
Kate Wright was filming for TOWIE alongside Georgia Kousoulou in Essex this week after returning home from the shows' stint in Tenerife.
The pair looked super dressed up, perhaps ready for a a glamorous event that will no doubt soon be aired during the ITVBe show.
Kate looked particularly dressy in this two-piece look. It's by reality star favourite Wolf & Wake who make their pieces to measure, which is why Kate's ensemble fits like a glove. The snug fit did wonders for her curvaceous figure. The crop and skirt combination showed off her taut abs while the stretchy scuba maxi skirt highlighted her frame and the fishtail added glamour while balancing the look back out.
You can find out how to order something similar on Wolf & Wake's Instagram page (right). Or bag yourself a blue maxi skirt with one from the line up below.

Flaunt it! Highlighting her narrow waist, her fishtail skirt exhibited her toned stomach as the full-length piece followed the shape of her hourglass curves as she arrived on set with Georgia
The 25-year-old Essex beauty's thigh-grazing wardrobe staple featured full-body embellishment and fringing.
Georgia - who is dating fellow TOWIE star Tommy Mallet - showcased her buxom bust in the daring number as it boasted sheer panelling, covering her modesty with carefully placed adornment.
Kate's striking appearance comes after she confirmed she is not flying to the Canary Islands to film with the rest of the cast - amid rumours of her romance with Rio Ferdinand.
The ITVBe darling revealed to OK! at the National Television Awards last week that she opted against the trip and will instead be 'staying at home... in the cold'.
Fringe benefits: ITVBe's Georgia looked incredible in a coordinating embellished mini dress that flaunted her bronzed glow after returning back from Tenerife on Thursday
All in the detail: The 25-year-old Essex beauty's thigh-grazing wardrobe staple featured full-body embellishment and fringing
Kate and the rest of the ITVBe cast often venture abroad to shoot more explosive scenes for the show - such as a trip to Tenerife in 2015 and more recently, their stint in Marbella, Spain back in September.
However the blonde beauty opted to be give the getaway a miss, as she admitted that it will be mostly couples in attendance.
Speaking at the awards ceremony, the Essex native explained: 'I’m not actually going to Tenerife. It's just the couples and a few single boys.' Before she added sarcastically: 'I'm staying at home…in the cold.'
However, her rejection of the trip comes in light of rumours she has been romantically linked with footballer Rio Ferdinand.
Daring: Georgia - who is dating fellow TOWIE star Tommy Mallet - showcased her buxom bust in the daring number as it boasted sheer panelling
Exquisite: Kate's striking appearance comes after she confirmed she is not flying to the Canary Islands to film with the rest of the cast - amid rumours of her romance with Rio Ferdinand
The blonde was said to be 'smitten' with the Manchester United legend, although he is reluctant to enter a serious relationship as the three children he shares with his late wife Rebecca 'remain his priority'.
Sources told The Sun that the duo have been spending time together in recent months yet he remains reserved on the union.
Rio suffered a devastating blow in 2015 when he lost his beloved wife Rebecca, who he married in 2009, at the hands of breast cancer, leaving him a single father to his three kids: sons Lorenz, ten, Tate, nine, and five-year-old daughter Tia.
Kate, meanwhile, has seen her love life played out on screen in TOWIE as her chequered long-term relationship with Dan Edgar disintegrated on-screen.
Brother where art thou? Siblings Chris and Jon Clark cut dapper figures in navy double breasted suits
Suit you! Pete Wicks arrived at filming looking sharp in a soft grey suit
Fix up, look sharp: The long-haired hunk teamed his dapper number with a black jumpers, white shirt and black tie
Now, sources claim the duo have struck a flame, with insiders telling the publication: 'Rio and Kate have enjoyed spending time with each other with other friends. There’s a real connection there but Rio is in no rush to turn this into a serious relationship.
'His number one priority are his three kids and he will always put their welfare in front of anything else. But Kate is very smitten with him and therefore happy to wait and see what happens.'
Also making a splash at filming was Megan McKenna and Pete Wicks, who appeared loved up after she was seen leaving the NTA's in tears.
However, Tenerife seemed to heal a rift between them following their explosive row last week.
Happy: Megan McKenna and Pete appeared in high spirits following their spat at the NTA's last week
